products.name: Espresso
products.description: A concentrated coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.
products.making_process: Grind coffee beans finely. Pack the grounds into the portafilter and tamp down evenly. Lock the portafilter in the espresso machine and start brewing. Serve immediately in a small cup.

products.name: Cappuccino
products.description: A classic Italian coffee drink made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam.
products.making_process: Prepare a shot of espresso. Steam milk to create microfoam. Pour the steamed milk over the espresso, followed by the milk foam on top. Optionally, sprinkle with cocoa powder or cinnamon.

products.name: Latte
products.description: A smooth and creamy coffee made with espresso and a generous amount of steamed milk.
products.making_process: Brew a shot of espresso. Steam milk to create a velvety texture. Pour the steamed milk over the espresso, leaving a small amount of foam to top. Optionally, add flavored syrups.

products.name: Americano
products.description: A simple coffee drink made by diluting espresso with hot water.
products.making_process: Brew one or two shots of espresso. Pour hot water over the espresso in a cup, adjusting the water to achieve your preferred strength.

products.name: Mocha
products.description: A delicious blend of espresso, steamed milk, and rich chocolate, topped with whipped cream.
products.making_process: Brew a shot of espresso. In a cup, combine espresso with chocolate syrup. Steam milk and pour it over the espresso mixture. Top with whipped cream and drizzle with additional chocolate syrup.

products.name: Cold Brew
products.description: A smooth, less acidic coffee brewed with cold water over an extended period.
products.making_process: Combine coarse coffee grounds with cold water in a jar. Stir and let steep in the refrigerator for 12-24 hours. Strain the mixture through a coffee filter or fine mesh. Serve over ice.
